data.title: Gem on 19rh Street
data.text: Loved them off campus, but now the they're right next door to Texas Tech it's awesome. Great coffee, WiFi and outdoor sitting area make this the place to get your caffeine buzz on - especially after a record setting Texas Tech/Oklahoma football "track meet"  Clean, cool and comfortable.   Love it!!!

data.title: Sugar Brown Latte a Must!
data.text:
Yellow House Coffee was our favorite shop but now we have a tie with Sugar Brown's. 

The Sugar Brown latte is my recommendation and unique to the shop. Sweet but not Starbucks feel-sick sweet.

The service is always friendly and you can grab a quick cup to go or enjoy the great environment at the shop. My kids even like going to hang out and color and pretend they are in college, ha!

Just a really cool little corner of the world in Lubbock with great coffee. They also sell beans and we like the rotating selection to try new blends.

data.title: Spacious with abundant seating and casual atmosphere
data.text: Ordering was easy - the menu is simple and the staff answered our questions about the coffees, teas, and drink options.  We ordered & paid and got our drinks quickly.  They have some fruit-flavored drinks if you don't like coffee or tea or just want to hydrate with something cold on a hot day.  We felt free to hang out & chat for a long time, as of course anyone should in a coffee/tea house.
